old_headline: Is Airbnb Legal in Melaka 2025? Complete Guide for Property Owners
new_headline: Is Airbnb Legal in Melaka 2026? YES — MOTAC Rules, STR Laws & Condo Guide
hypothesis: High-intent query ('is airbnb legal in melaka') from property owners evaluating investment. Page had never been SEO-optimized. (1) Updated year 2025→2026 for freshness signal — financial/legal content must feel current. (2) Added 'YES' answer in title for immediate CTR boost (answers intent before click). (3) Added MOTAC, STR Laws, Condo as specific terms matching searcher sub-intents. (4) Added FAQ JSON-LD schema (6 questions) targeting rich snippet eligibility. Targets: 'is airbnb legal in melaka', 'airbnb regulations melaka 2026', 'motac airbnb rules malaysia'.

baseline_metrics.notes: Page existed since initial commit but never had SEO work done.
